name: Immortal Plight
description:
A BAD DEVIL DEAL FOR IMMORTALITY

You don't remember much. All around you are unfamiliar faces, hellish environment. Welcome to hell. 

The devil himself will introduce you to the world, and explain the bad deal done and what will happen to you. Might as well heed his words. Maybe there's a way out...
